intro: Calatola laevigata, commonly known as the smooth calatola, is a flowering plant belonging to the Apiaceae family. It is native to parts of southern Africa, particularly South Africa. The plant is characterized by its smooth, cylindrical stems and small, clustered white or greenish flowers. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and have a mild, aromatic scent. Calatola laevigata is often found in grasslands and rocky areas, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
